casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jose Luis MACIAS. No. 510P04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Sept. 2, 2015. Jose Luis Macias, Nashville, for Macias, Jose Luis. Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, for State of NC. Robert A. Evans, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th of August 2015 by Defendant for Petition for Writ of Error:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd of September 2015."
